articles.author: Lynn Butler
articles.title: 16 all out! Proteas U19 Women overpower newcomers Samoa at T20 World Cup
articles.description: SA U19 Women thrashed Samoa by a commanding 10-wickets to top Group C in the U19 T20 World Cup at Borneo Cricket Ground in Malaysia.
articles.content: South Africa's U19 Women thrashed Samoa by a commanding 10 wickets on Monday after bowling them out for a paltry 16 to top Group C in the U19 T20 World Cup at Borneo Cricket Ground in Sarawak, Malays… [+1673 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
